snippet.title: OXENFREE II: Lost Signals - Release Date Trailer - Coming July 12, 2023
snippet.description:
🔺 Pre-Order Now: https://bit.ly/m/oxenfreeii

OXENFREE II: Lost Signals arrives July 12, 2023 for Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 5 & 4, Steam, and Netflix.

In the mind-bending follow-up to OXENFREE from Night School Studio, you'll play as Riley Poverly, an environmental researcher. Equipped with a radio, walkie talkie, and a set of transmitters, she must stop a mysterious cult-like group from opening a rift between realities and timelines. As you play, you'll shape the story through your choices. How you choose to deal with the supernatural events at hand will forever alter the future.

📻 Tune In:
Add to your wishlist: https://nightschoolstudio.com/oxenfree-ii
Twitter: https://twitter.com/nightschoolers
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/nightschoolstudio
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nightschoolstudio
